Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class GraceNote

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.notation.GraceNote
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Notation.Connectable, Ornamental, Pitched
    public final class GraceNote
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pitched, Ornamental, Notation.Connectable
    Represents a grace note.

    This class is immutable.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.wmn4j.notation.Ornamental

        displayableDuration - the displayable duration of the grace note
        articulations - a set of Articulations associated with the grace note

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
